articles.description: Ofcom spokesperson says watchdog has not decided whether to investigate yet
articles.content:
More than 200 complaints have been made over a deepfake version of the Queens speech aired on Christmas Day.
The alternate Christmas message, shown on Channel 4, saw a digitally-created version of B… [+1355 chars]
